# Security Policy

## Supported Versions

We actively support and maintain the latest stable version of the `GhostTyper-AI-Writing-Assistant-Browser-Extension`.

| Version | Supported |
|---------|-----------|
| Latest  | ✅        |
| Previous| ❌        |

## Reporting a Vulnerability

We take security seriously. If you find a vulnerability in `GhostTyper-AI-Writing-Assistant-Browser-Extension`, please report it via **one** of the following methods:

1.  **GitHub Security Advisory:** [https://github.com/chirag127/GhostTyper-AI-Writing-Assistant-Browser-Extension/security/advisories/new](https://github.com/chirag127/GhostTyper-AI-Writing-Assistant-Browser-Extension/security/advisories/new)
2.  **Email:** Send a detailed report to `security@yourdomain.com` (replace with actual security contact if available).

**Please do NOT disclose any vulnerability publicly until it has been addressed.**

**When reporting a vulnerability, please include the following information:**

*   A clear and concise description of the vulnerability.
*   The affected version(s) of `GhostTyper-AI-Writing-Assistant-Browser-Extension`.
*   Steps to reproduce the vulnerability.
*   Proof-of-concept code (if applicable).
*   Your suggested mitigation or fix (if you have one).

We will acknowledge your report within **48 hours** and will keep you updated on the progress towards a fix.

## Responsible Disclosure Timeline

We aim to follow these guidelines for addressing reported vulnerabilities:

1.  **Acknowledge Report:** Within 48 hours.
2.  **Triage and Investigate:** Within 7 days.
3.  **Develop Fix:** Based on severity and complexity, typically within 30 days.
4.  **Release Fix:** Coordinate with the reporter for a mutually agreeable disclosure date.
5.  **Public Disclosure:** After a fix is released.

This timeline may be adjusted based on the severity and complexity of the vulnerability.
